name: Introduction to Gender & Sexuality Studies
description: An introduction to the field of Gender & Sexuality Studies, focusing on the history of the field, its major concepts, and its relevance to the Humanities.

name: Gender & Sexuality in Politics
description: An exploration of the role of gender and sexuality in the political arena, focusing on the history of the field and its relevance to contemporary politics.

name: Gender & Sexuality in Literature
description: An exploration of the role of gender and sexuality in literature, looking at how gender and sexuality are represented in different works of literature.

name: Gender & Sexuality in Art
description: An exploration of the role of gender and sexuality in art, looking at how gender and sexuality are represented in different works of art.

name: Gender & Sexuality in Media & Popular Culture
description: A study of the role of gender and sexuality in media and popular culture, focusing on how gender and sexuality are represented in different media and in popular culture.
